name: AI Draw.io Agent
description: An AI-powered diagram generation agent that creates draw.io diagrams from natural language descriptions.

skills.name: Generate Diagram
skills.description: Generate a draw.io diagram from a text description. Supports flowcharts, architecture diagrams, sequence diagrams, and more.
examples: Draw a simple flowchart with start, process, and end
Create an AWS architecture diagram with EC2, RDS, and S3
Draw a transformer architecture with animated connectors

skills.name: Edit Diagram
skills.description: Edit an existing draw.io diagram based on instructions.
